detailed_profile.name: Poojitha Pinniboyana
detailed_profile.position: Global SIA @Danone || Product Marketing @Crossbeam || HEC Paris MiM || Charpak Scholarship Holder || IIT Kharagpur
detailed_profile.about: I am currently pursuing Master in Management at HEC Paris. I am skilled at synthesising insights from the data and building a story. I have had an opportunity to explore diverse industries such as B Corp FMCG, B2B tech and fin-tech. I want to drive impact by making sense of data to give direction to the go to market strategy in an organisation.

experience.title: Product Marketing Intern
experience.description: Working in Growth & GTM Team at Crossbeam Crossbeam is the first and largest Ecosystem-Led Growth platform, used by over 30,000 companies to attract, convert, and grow customer relationships using their partner ecosystems.Mission: Maximized the impact of product and new features by turning complex technical and qualitative info into clear messaging for users and internal teams. Collaborated with the Marketing team to plan and executed external communication campaigns across multiple channels to drive both product adoption and user acquisition. Implemented strategies to increase active users on the platform by utilizing in-app messaging, targeted email campaigns, and interactive product tours.Created clear, engaging content to inform external users about product updates, including feature announcements, how-to guides, and demo videos to boost awareness and usage.Provided internal teams, including sales and customer success, with updated product decks, demos, and sales enablement tools to effectively communicate product value and close deals.
experience.description_html:
Working in Growth & GTM Team at Crossbeam

Crossbeam is the first and largest Ecosystem-Led Growth platform, used by over 30,000 companies to attract, convert, and grow customer relationships using their partner ecosystems.

Mission:
Maximized the impact of product and new features by turning complex technical and qualitative info into clear messaging for users and internal teams.

Collaborated with the Marketing team to plan and executed external communication campaigns across multiple channels to drive both product adoption and user acquisition.

Implemented strategies to increase active users on the platform by utilizing in-app messaging, targeted email campaigns, and interactive product tours.

Created clear, engaging content to inform external users about product updates, including feature announcements, how-to guides, and demo videos to boost awareness and usage.

Provided internal teams, including sales and customer success, with updated product decks, demos, and sales enablement tools to effectively communicate product value and close deals.

recommendations: Chelsey Davis ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Poojitha during her internship at Crossbeam, and I can confidently say she has been an incredible asset to our team. Starting her internship on the very first day of the Reveal and Crossbeam merger‚Äîa time of significant change and adjustment‚ÄîPoojitha took it all in stride with a positive attitude and unwavering enthusiasm. One of Poojitha‚Äôs standout qualities is her ability to quickly learn new tools and processes. She doesn‚Äôt just familiarize herself with them; she dives deep to understand how to make a meaningful impact. Whether it‚Äôs jumping in to help on any project or bringing thoughtful, creative ideas to the table, Poojitha consistently goes above and beyond expectations. She‚Äôs unafraid to share her perspective, which has been invaluable in shaping our work. A few of her notable contributions include building out an onboarding flow for our Crossbeam for Sales product‚Äîa crucial project for our overall customer experience. Prior to her work, customers were left to navigate the product on their own. Thanks to Poojitha, we now have a structured, user-friendly onboarding flow that sets customers up for success. She also made significant strides in creating sales collateral, including sales overview decks for Crossbeam, Crossbeam for Sales, and Crossbeam Copilot. Her efforts extended to creating product demo tours for our website, showcasing our platform‚Äôs capabilities, and assisting with emails, in-app communications, and other marketing materials. Poojitha‚Äôs ability to adapt, her creativity, and her willingness to roll up her sleeves and tackle any challenge have made her an integral part of our team. I‚Äôm confident she will excel in whatever she pursues next, and I wholeheartedly recommend her for any opportunity that comes her way. She‚Äôs an absolute star, and I can‚Äôt wait to see all that she achieves in the future!‚Äù

Ad√®le Qu√©m√©ner ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Poojitha at Crossbeam, and she impressed me with how quickly she learned about Crossbeam‚Äôs product and processes. She created great content to promote Crossbeam to the right users. Poojitha is very autonomous, proactive and always has a very positive mindset. Working with her is a great experience!‚Äù
